DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find gene predict whether person develop side effect antipsychotic medication , weight gain , blood sugar dysregulation , immune cell abnormality . We collect blood sample participant take second-generation antipsychotic medication . These blood sample store long-term biobank , use later genetic test cell-based study .

Participants ' identity match cod identifier single , hard-copy Master Coding List . The maintenance security list responsibility Principal Investigator . Samples within freezer maintain via positional numbered grid within Laboratory Information Management System . This grid also allow study team link barcoded sample participant 's cod identifier .
